text: Turbogears 2 vs Django - any advice on choosing replacement for Turbogears 1?
I have been using Turbogears 1 for prototyping small sites for the last couple of years and it is getting a little long in the tooth.
Any suggestions on making the call between upgrading to Turbogears 2 or switching to something like Django?
I'm torn between the familiarity of the TG community who are pretty responsive and do pretty good documentation vs the far larger community using Django.
I am quite tempted by the built-in CMS features and the Google AppEngine support.
